summary: A documentary on Levon Helm, a founding member of The Band, at home in Woodstock in the midst of creating his first studio album in 25 years.
cast: Larry Campbell|Jay Collins|Elizabeth Danko|Amy Helm|Levon Helm|Barney Hoskyns|Barbara O'Brien|Billy Bob Thornton|Libby Titus|Teresa Williams
title: Ain't in It for My Health: A Film About Levon Helm
